sentences.sContent: Gather the right crew: You’ll need the right partners in crime to pull the heist.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gather the right crew: You’ll need the right partners in crime to pull the heist.
sentences.sCn: 召集合适的搭档： 你将需要一些合适的正在犯罪的搭档去抢劫。

sentences.sContent: It had not been much of a heist; he said his accomplice “got some change” but he got nothing.
sentences.sContent_eng: It had not been much of a heist; he said his accomplice “got some change” but he got nothing.
sentences.sCn: 那都说不上是一次抢劫，他说他的同谋“搞了点零钱”而他一无所获。

sentences.sContent: Angelina plays Gloria, a young girl whose brother was killed in the heist-gone-wrong.
sentences.sContent_eng: Angelina plays Gloria, a young girl whose brother was killed in the heist-gone-wrong.
sentences.sCn: 安吉丽娜饰演格罗瑞亚，她的哥哥在那次抢劫中被误杀。

remMethod.val: 电影《偷天盗影》的英文是Heist

trans.tranOther: A heist is a robbery, especially one in which money, jewellery, or art is stolen
